flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
With these beach-y keen finds for your home, you can enjoy the essence of the sea long after summer ends. Don't forget the sunscreen!Beach Wall Mural, target.comWill Ferrell Sunscreen, fredflare.com. Proceeds go toward Cancer for College, a scholarship fund for cancer survivors.Finn Salt and Pepper Shakers, kikkerlandshop.comSolar Radio AM/FM/Weather Band, kikkerlandshop.com Monopoly Surfing Collectors Edition, shopkitson.comFlip Flop Mat.....

Read More: Create Beach Bum at your own home
